name: CCB Egg Bites
description: Everybody loves CCB (Cheddar, Chive & Bacon)! Pop these 20-minute bites into their lunch box with a muffin and any fruit or veggies you have on hand.

ingredients.name: CCB Dip Mix or Cheesy Fries Seasoning

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Using Basting Brush, lightly oil two Muffin Makers and place on Sheet Pan.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and dip mix. Pour into muffin cavities, filling each about 3⁄4 full. Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 15 min or until eggs are set. Let cool slightly before removing from cups.
tips: Making Egg Bites is a great way to get more veggies into kids’ lunches. Add chopped broccoli or chopped veggies of your choice to the bottom of each muffin cup before pouring in the egg mixture.
Recipe makes enough for six lunches (2 bites per lunch). Make ahead at the beginning of the week and refrigerate for up to 4 days. Microwave 30–45 seconds or serve cool.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup veggies and Cucumber Pinwheels.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favourite.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Basting Brush (1006236)
summary: This silicone brush is perfect for grilling, roasting & baking.

products.name: Muffin Maker (Set of 2)
summary: Make perfect portions of your favourite sweet or savoury cupcakes, muffins, frittatas, meatloaves, & more!
